headline: Casinos Push Congress to Undo Gambling Provision in Trump Tax Law
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The gaming industry’s push to reverse a provision in President Donald Trump’s tax law requiring gamblers to pay taxes on some of their losses is gaining bipartisan momentum in Congress.
